items.sentence: Everyone is eligible regardless of nationality.
Everyone seems to be short of money these days.
Is this the first time you\'ve ever ice skated?
Tom spent his birthday in solitary confinement.
I wonder whether there really is a Santa Claus.
Tom was devastated when Mary broke up with him.
Tom was eliminated before he got to the finals.
Tom was finally able to get in touch with Mary.
Tom was in a hurry and forgot to comb his hair.
Please promise me that you\'ll never lie again.
Tom and Mary are working on something together.
I didn\'t realize that Tom didn\'t know French.
I didn\'t realize you didn\'t know how to swim.
Tom wanted Mary to wait for him at the library.
Tom was afraid that Mary might change her mind.
Tom yanked the microphone out of Mary\'s hands.
Tom\'s wife and my wife went shopping together.
Tom used to be the fastest swimmer on our team.
French is the only language I\'m able to speak.
Let us know if you don\'t understand something.
